data.title: Summer starts in Ibiza
data.meta_description: Discover The Ibiza Twiins, the ideal resort in Ibiza for high quality accommodation, entertainment, dining and exciting events. Explore the beaches, visit the walled city of Dalt Vila, dive into the hippy markets and savour delicious Mediterranean cuisine. Your summer in Ibiza begins at The Ibiza Twiins.
data.text:
Mediterranean-style rooms: The Ibiza Twiins offers high-quality accommodation options, including hotels and apartments with different amenities and styles. You can choose between different categories of rooms and suites to meet your needs and preferences. Enjoy sweet dreams in Joy or Life! Entertainment areas: The complex includes areas designed for entertainment and fun. You can enjoy pools, relaxation areas, balconies with panoramic views, games areas and live performances.

Cuisine: The Ibiza Twiins is home to a variety of restaurants and bars that offer a broad selection of culinary options. You can try local and international dishes prepared by our chefs, and also enjoy refreshing cocktails and drinks. Among our restaurant options is our fun Foodie Truck, our La Cascada snack bar and the La Sal buffet-style restaurant with show cooking. For dinner, you will be amazed by the Ibizan/Mediterranean flavours at our La Sal restaurant, where you can dine while you enjoy our evening show.

Events and shows: The Ibiza Twiins organises events and shows, with a line-up of over 20 artists. Every evening, a story about Ibiza is narrated through music, dance and a large screen showing images that capture the history of the island. Enjoy your visit to The Ibiza Twiins and make the most of everything that we have to offer!

Your summer, of course, begins in Ibiza, which is famous for its lively nightlife. During summer, it becomes one of the top destinations for those who love partying and electronic music. Ibiza’s famous nightclubs, such as Amnesia, Pacha and Privilege host events with the best international DJs, creating an exhilarating party atmosphere.

But much more awaits you in Ibiza – there is a wide range of activities and places to visit. Below are some recommendations for what to do on your visit to the white island:

Explore the beaches and coves: Ibiza is known for its beautiful beaches and coves with crystal-clear water. Some of the most popular beaches include Playa d’en Bossa, where The Ibiza Twiins is located, Cala Comte, Cala Salada, Talamanca and Las Salinas. Enjoy the sun, swim in the sea and relax on the sand.

Visit the fortified town of Dalt Vila: Dalt Vila, a walled city declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is the old town of Ibiza Town. Walk through its cobbled streets, admire the impressive views from the walls and explore its shops, restaurants and museums.
